title: The Case for Commodities: ‘Super-Backwardation,’ Structural Demand and Inventory Shortages
description: In the latest episode of Exchanges at Goldman Sachs, Jeffrey Currie, Global Head of Commodities Research in the Goldman Sachs Research, discusses why he believes commodities are entering a supercycle and how the current geopolitical landscape is shaping commodity markets.
itunes:author: Goldman Sachs
